Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Major Update: Google Sheets CRM Integration + Improvements

Features Added:
- Google Sheets CRM integration (3-sheet structure)
  - Client Consultations tracking
  - Recommendations Detail with all 5 recommendations
  - Performance Analytics with cost tracking
- CLI interface (run_consultation.py) with --audio flag
- Separate token tracking (audio input, text input, output)
- Cost calculation with Gemini 2.5 Flash 2025 pricing
- Retry logic with exponential backoff for API timeouts
- Improved holistic reasoning with smart fallback

Improvements:
- Enhanced README with Google Sheets setup guide
- Better error handling and logging
- Fixed "Not ranked by AI" issue with intelligent fallbacks
- Cleaned up codebase (moved demos/tests to deprecated/)

Files Added:
- run_consultation.py - Main CLI entry point
- google_sheets_integration.py - CRM integration
- setup_existing_sheet.py - Google Sheets setup automation
- GOOGLE_SHEETS_SETUP.md - CRM documentation

Files Modified:
- main_pipeline_ranking.py - Added token/cost tracking
- ranking_engine.py - Added retry logic and fallback reasoning
- README.md - Updated with new usage examples
- requirements.txt - Added Google Sheets dependencies
